{"id":1201304722,"question_id":2902,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"8 hours, 3 minutes","timestamp":1710228499,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"52 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1201304722/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Pair Sum in an Array","memory":"79.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        map<int, vector<int>> m;\n        for(int n: nums){\n            string s = to_string(n);\n            vector<char> v(s.begin(), s.end());\n            int max_digit = *max_element(v.begin(), v.end()) - '0';\n            m[max_digit].push_back(n);\n        }\n        int ma = -1;\n        for(auto &[k, v]: m){\n            if(v.size() < 2) continue;\n            sort(v.rbegin(), v.rend());\n            ma = max(ma, v[0] + v[1]);\n        }\n        return ma;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-pair-sum-in-an-array","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
